q: Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. 1. . Eric Schmidt and Page said the moves are intended to speed up decision-making at the top of the Internet giant, which also posted strong fourth- quarter results. The management reshuffle has been brought about to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said.
